snippet: Two people were killed and at least 11 were injured Monday afternoon in a collision between a Larimore School District bus and a train, the authorities said.
abstract: Police in North Dakota say two people were killed and at least 11 injured in collision between a school bus and freight train.
lead_paragraph: Two people were killed and at least 11 were injured Monday afternoon in a collision between a Larimore School District bus and a train, the authorities said.

headline.main: North Dakota: Train-School Bus Crash Kills 2
headline.print_headline: North Dakota: Train and School Bus Collide, Killing 2
